title: Value of the leading merchandise exporters worldwide 2018 , by exporting nation
yAxis: Export value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Exporting nation, and Export value in billion U.S. dollars in each Exporting nation on the y axis.
Exporting nation China has the highest Export value in billion U.S. dollars and Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has the lowest Export value in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 2188.0 between the maximum Exporting nation China and minimum Exporting nation Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Exporting nation in the x axis and Export value in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Export value in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Exporting nation China and lowest at Exporting nation Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Exporting nation, and Export value in billion U.S. dollars in each Exporting nation on the y axis.
Exporting nation China has the highest Export value in billion U.S. dollars and Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has the lowest Export value in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 2188.0 between the maximum Exporting nation China and minimum Exporting nation Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Exporting nation in the x axis and Export value in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Exporting nation China has the highest Export value in billion U.S. dollars and Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has the lowest Export value in billion U.S. dollars.
The second highest Export value in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Exporting nation Extra-EU (28).
There is a difference of 2188.0 between the maximum Exporting nation China and minimum Exporting nation Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
Export value in billion U.S. dollars at Exporting nation China is 2487.0 , second place is Extra-EU (28) at 2309.0, and thirdly is United States at 1664.0.
The Exporting nation China tends to be 3.18 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Exporting nations, we get total 11748.0.
